docs.title: NORMAL mode
docs.text:
Shift is the main modifier
  • Behaves the same on every operating system
  • Most accessible modifier by default
Left hand is focused on motions
  • This includes entering INSERT mode
  • X and C do not map to Cut or Copy operators because motions become too left-hand heavy
Left hand keymap q Replace charQ Replace mode w Previous wordW Previous End of Word e UpE Half page up r Next wordR Previous word t Delete char and insertT Delete line and insert a Insert before cursorA Insert start of line s LeftS Start of line (non-blank) d DownD Half page down f RightF End of line g Insert after cursorG Insert end of line zc Move after next cZcMove before previous c xc Move to next cXc Move to previous c c Delete charC Delete line v Repeat last motionV Repeat last motion reversed b Insert new lineB Insert new line above Right hand is focused on operators
  • Repeat is front and center
  • Del, Change, Copy are simple to access
  • Replace char is a WiP, might need to give way to a more important key
